snippet: It’s time for the United States to disabuse Egyptian leaders of the notion that they are entitled to aid in perpetuity.
abstract: Editorial contends it is time that the United States disabuses Egypt of notion that annual $1.3 billion US military aid package is an entitlement they are due in perpetuity; calls on Obama administration to reform and cut its aid package to signal that it can no longer condone brutality of Abdel Fattah el-Sisi's government.
lead_paragraph: It’s time for the United States to disabuse Egyptian leaders of the notion that they are entitled to aid in perpetuity.
